sentences.en: a triangular contest in an election
sentences.cn: 竞选中三位候选人的角逐

sentences.en: Are you going to enter yourself for the contest?
sentences.cn: 你打算报名参加比赛 吗 ?

sentences.en: Gerald was no longer the odds-on favourite to win the contest.
sentences.cn: 杰拉尔德不再是有望赢得比赛的热门人选。

sentences.en: he pleaded no contest to two misdemeanor counts.
sentences.cn: 他对被控的两项轻罪申明不抗辩。

sentences.en: Her misspelling of that word eliminated her from the contest.
sentences.cn: 因为她把那个单词写错了,所以不能参加比赛.

sentences.en: His brothers are contesting the will.
sentences.cn: 他的兄弟们对遗嘱提出质疑。

sentences.en: His wife is contesting a seat on the council.
sentences.cn: 他妻子在角逐市政会的一个席位。

sentences.en: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.cn: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.en: I'm going to be emceeing a costume contest.
sentences.cn: 我将担任一场扮装比赛的司仪。

sentences.en: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.cn: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.en: It was an uneven contest.
sentences.cn: 这是一场不公平的竞赛。

sentences.en: She had to contest against a very strong opponent for the championship.
sentences.cn: 她必须与强劲的对手手角逐冠军.

sentences.en: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.cn: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.en: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.cn: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

sentences.en: The contest has become personalised, if not bitter.
sentences.cn: 这场角逐开始针对个人了，甚至话语也变得尖刻起来。

sentences.en: The contest should be very keenly fought.
sentences.cn: 比赛将会争夺得非常激烈。

sentences.en: The contest was as much about personalities as it was about politics.
sentences.cn: 竞赛比手段策略，也比个性。

sentences.en: the Eurovision Song Contest
sentences.cn: 欧洲电视网歌曲大赛

sentences.en: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest.
sentences.cn: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

sentences.en: The match looks like being a David and Goliath contest.
sentences.cn: 比赛看上去像是一场力量悬殊的较量。

sentences.en: The presidential contest is nip and tuck.
sentences.cn: 总统竞选势均力敌。

sentences.en: This has stripped the contest down to its essentials.
sentences.cn: 这就使比赛精简到最基本的环节。

phrases.tran_cn: 势均力敌的竞争(指竞选等)
（裁判因拳手比赛消极而宣布）比赛无效，比赛作废

trans.tran_cn: 比赛，竞赛，（权利）争夺，竞争
trans.tran_en: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other
a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other
a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other
to compete for something or to try to win it

trans.tran_cn: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
trans.tran_en: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it
